DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the biological activity of ZD6126 in subjects with newly diagnosed metastatic renal cell carcinoma (stage IV).
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study to Assess the Biological Activity of ZD6126 in Subjects With Newly Diagnosed Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma (Stage IV)
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed metastatic renal cell carcinoma Suitable for nephrectomy Prior chemotherapy, biological therapy or radiation therapy for renal cell carcinoma or within the last 3 years for any other cancer Significant cardiac event within 3 months of entry Any history of coronary angioplasty or history of myocardial infarction
